name: Flappy Weird Family - a weird series
name_original: Flappy Weird Family - a weird series
description:
Flappy Weird Fly is a new minimal game of the Weird series, from the creators of the acclaimed "Weird Smile" game.
Tap on your device to flap your wings and make the Weird Hero fly. Avoid pipes and go as far as you can.
Compete with your friends to beat their scores. Show them who the Weirdest Hero is!

Features:
- Game Center Support
- Minimal Design
- Endless Fun

Just one more tap... tap, tap...
Enjoy!
